dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. From: Mercator's Atlas. [Amsterdam : Jan Jansson, 1634] Matches Burden's description of version with Dutch text; pagination 379 8.T; from the Atlas of 1634. Includes ill. of ships and sea monsters, and insets showing "Polus Arcticus" region and "Terra Australis incognita." Dutch text on verso.
